name: Boxed in Space
description:
Celebrating its economic and social prosperity, an alien race has decided to set up a party in one of its most elegant UFOs. This year they have decided to gather the most exotic creatures of the galaxy to expose and in this way give a special touch to their party. You are one of those creatures and you must return safely to your home, descending through all the floors of the ship.

@SaraLópez Designer
